page.title: 09KESTREL BY THE MOTORWAY.
page.content: In the central reservation between the two lanes of the A1(M) motorway south of the interchange with the A68 we observed a kestral which seemed to have its nest in the grass there. It flew up into the sky and hovered over a nearby field and attacked something in the field. It then carried what appeared to be its prey back to the central reservation. We were anable to verify whether our assumption that it was nesting there was true because of the inaccessibility of the spot. However, this inaccessibility makes it an ideal spot for the kestral to next in an area which would otherwise be unsafe because of its closeness to a built-up area.
